sourcesContent:
import React from 'react';
import ContractForm from "../ContractForm";
import { drizzleConnect } from "drizzle-react";
import { Form, Col, Row, Button, Card, InputGroup, FormControl } from "react-bootstrap";
 
class NewResident extends React.Component {
	constructor(props) {
		super(props);
		this.state = {
			name: ""
		}
	}

	render() {
		console.log(this.state);
		return(
			<Card>
				<label>Nombre</label>
				<InputGroup className="mb-3" onChange={evt => this.updateInputValue(evt)}>
    				<FormControl
      					placeholder="Introduce tu nombre"
      					aria-label="Introduce tu nombre"
      					aria-describedby="basic-addon1"
    				/>
  				</InputGroup>

  				<label>Email</label>
				<InputGroup className="mb-3">
    				<FormControl
      					placeholder="Introduce tu email"
      					aria-label="Introduce tu email"
      					aria-describedby="basic-addon1"
    				/>
  				</InputGroup>

  				<Row>
  					<Col>
  						<label>Teléfono</label>
						<InputGroup className="mb-3">
	    					<FormControl
	      						placeholder="Introduce tu teléfono"
	      						aria-label="Introduce tu teléfono"
	      						aria-describedby="basic-addon1"
	    					/>
  						</InputGroup>
  					</Col>
  					<Col>
  						<label>Código de Madrid Central</label>
						<InputGroup className="mb-3">
	    					<FormControl
	      						placeholder="Introduce tu código de Madrid Central"
	      						aria-label="Introduce tu código de Madrid Central"
	      						aria-describedby="basic-addon1"
	    					/>
  						</InputGroup>
  					</Col>
  				</Row>
  				<Row>
  					<Col>
  						<label>Precio</label>
						<InputGroup className="mb-3">
	    					<FormControl
	      						placeholder="Elige un precio"
	      						aria-label="Elige un precio"
	      						aria-describedby="basic-addon1"
	    					/>
  						</InputGroup>
  					</Col>
  					<Col>
  						<label>Número de invitaciones</label>
						<InputGroup className="mb-3">
	    					<FormControl
	      						placeholder="Elige el número de invitaciones disponibles"
	      						aria-label="Elige el número de invitaciones disponibles"
	      						aria-describedby="basic-addon1"
	    					/>
  						</InputGroup>
  					</Col>
  				</Row>
  				<Row>
  					<Col>
  						<Button variant="dark" size="lg" type="submit">
							Añadir residente
						</Button>
  					</Col>
  				</Row>
			</Card>
		);
	}

	updateInputValue(evt) {
	    this.setState({
	      name: evt.target.value
	    });
  	}
}

const mapStateToProps = state => {
  return {
    MadridCentral: state.contracts.MadridCentral,
    accounts: state.accounts
  };
};

export default drizzleConnect(NewResident, mapStateToProps);
